kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (143.0.7499.169) detected in PATH at C:\ChromeForTesting\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (144.0.7559.133); currently, chromedriver 144.0.7559.133 is recommended for chrome 144.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

errors.msg: The chromedriver version (143.0.7499.169) detected in PATH at C:\ChromeForTesting\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (144.0.7559.133); currently, chromedriver 144.0.7559.133 is recommended for chrome 144.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
